description:
The girls of C³ set out to camp on a remote southern island. In order to deepen relations with another all-girls survival game team, the Seto Family Team, the game begins with a landing operation as they come ashore. Then both teams camp together, sharing dinner and baths and having fun. But the next morning, they discover that the team flags they intended to use in a flag battle are missing...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Remote Island Game Burns Hot.
孤島ボツコハ熱ク萌ユ.
